content: the drew beanie crochet pattern features a wonderful pattern of front and back post double_crochet stitches it has the look and feel of a basketweave stitch but in miniature form i really love this texture it s constructed from the brim up and is sized to fit an adult head but in the pattern notes i will give you some guidance should you wish to change the size this hat has a bit of slouch to it when worn this crochet pattern is available in english only and written in american crochet terms a free copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com/drew-beanie-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level intermediate gauge 16 sts x 8 row of half_double_crochet = 4 inches finished size 9 x 10 5 inches laid flat yarn wool-ease® by lion brand® yarn 80% acrylic 20% wool 197 yds/180 m 3oz/85 g 4 medium/worsted weight 1 5 balls of forest green heather hook size h/8 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge optional pompom to attach to the top
